ModMetaData.name: Starts From Scratch
ModMetaData.description:
从零开始研究 在新游戏开始时，所有的科技和蓝图都会被遗忘，这可以显著增加游戏时间。配合“研究很困难”mod，体验会更佳。
使用指南： 需要在新游戏开始前启用此Mod，中途加入无效。如果你想在游戏中遗忘已完成的科技和获得的蓝图，可以在开发者模式中执行相应的操作。请注意，这将遗忘所有的科技和应用的蓝图。
Starting Research from Scratch When starting a new game, all technologies and blueprints will be forgotten, significantly extending game time. The experience is even better when combined with the "Hard Research" mod.
Usage Guide: This mod needs to be enabled before starting a new game; it won't take effect if added mid-game. If you want to forget completed technologies and obtained blueprints during the game, you can perform the corresponding action in developer mode. Please note, this will forget all technologies and applied blueprints.
